summary: The manager of Kay Kyser's band books them for a birthday party bash for an heiress at a spooky mansion, where sinister forces try to kill her.
cast: Kay Kyser|Peter Lorre|Boris Karloff|Bela Lugosi|Helen Parrish|Dennis O'Keefe|Alma Kruger|Joseph Eggenton|Kay Kyser Band|Ginny Simms|Harry Babbitt|M.A. Bogue|Sully Mason|Mary Bovard|Jeff Corey|Louise Currie|Bess Flowers|Lyman Gandee|Renee Godfrey|Bobby Guy|Jeanne Houser|Richard Kipling|Eleanor Lawson|Larry McGrath|Frank Mills|Mimi Montaye|Dorothy Moore|Leonard Mudie|Joseph North|Frank O'Connor|Beulah Parkington|Jane Patten|Eugenia Rafee|William Telaak|Joan Warner|Guy Webster|Mary Martha Wood
title: El castillo de los misterios
